| `enable_mergejoin`                         | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `enable_nestloop`                          | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `enable_seqscan`                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `enable_sort`                              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `enable_tidscan`                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `escape_string_warning`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Warns about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `event_source`                             | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the application name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in the event log.                                                                                                                                          |
| `exit_on_error`                            | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Terminates session on any error.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `external_pid_file`                        | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `extra_float_digits`                       | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.                                                                                                                                                            |
| `from_collapse_limit`                      | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the `FROM`-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `fsync`                                    | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Forces synchronization of updates to disk.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `full_page_writes`                         | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.                                                                                                                                                          |
| `geqo`                                     | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables genetic query optimization.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `geqo_effort`                              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.                                                                                                                                                        |
| `geqo_generations`                         | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `geqo_pool_size`                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | GEQO: number of individuals in the population.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `geqo_seed`                                | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | GEQO: seed for random path selection.                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `geqo_selection_bias`                      | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | GEQO: selective pressure within the population.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `geqo_threshold`                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the threshold of `FROM` items beyond which GEQO is used.                                                                                                                                                             |
| `gin_fuzzy_search_limit`                   | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `hba_file`                                 | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the server's "hba" configuration file.                                                                                                                                                                               |
| `hot_standby`                              | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Allows connections and queries during recovery.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `hot_standby_feedback`                     | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Allows feedback from a hot standby to the primary that avoids query conflicts.                                                                                                                                        |
| `huge_pages`                               | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Uses huge pages on Linux.                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| `icu_short_form`[^1]                           | D        | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the ICU collation order configuration.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `ident_file`                               | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the server's "ident" configuration file.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `ignore_checksum_failure`                  | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Continues processing after a checksum failure.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `ignore_system_indexes`                    | C<br/>S | Reload<br/>Immediate                       | Service<br/>User  | Disables reading from system indexes. (Can also be set with `PGOPTIONS` at session start.)                                                                                                                                |
| `index_advisor.enabled`[^1]                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Enables Index Advisor plugin.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `integer_datetimes`                        | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Datetimes are integer based.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `intervalStyle`                            | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the display format for interval values.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `join_collapse_limit`                      | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the `FROM`-list size beyond which `JOIN` constructs are not flattened.                                                                                                                                               |
| `krb_caseins_users`                        | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets whether Kerberos and GSSAPI user names should be treated as case-insensitive.                                                                                                                                        |
| `krb_server_keyfile`                       | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `lc_collate`                               | D        | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the collation order locale.                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `lc_ctype`                                 | D        | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the character classification and case conversion locale.                                                                                                                                                            |
| `lc_messages`                              | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the language in which messages are displayed.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `lc_monetary`                              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `lc_numeric`                               | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the locale for formatting numbers.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `lc_time`                                  | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `listen_addresses`                         | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the host name or IP address(es) to listen to.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `local_preload_libraries`                  | C<br/>S | Reload<br/>Immediate                       | Service<br/>User  | Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend. (Can also be set with `PGOPTIONS` at session start.)                                                                                                                 |
| `lock_timeout`                             | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the maximum time allowed that a statement may wait for a lock.                                                                                                                                                       |
| `lo_compat_privileges`                     | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Enables backward compatibility mode for privilege checks on large objects.                                                                                                                                                |
| `log_autovacuum_min_duration`              | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the minimum execution time above which autovacuum actions are logged.                                                                                                                                            |
| `log_checkpoints`                          | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Logs each checkpoint.                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `log_connections`                          | C<br/>S | Reload<br/>Immediate                       | Service<br/>User  | Logs each successful connection. (Can also be set with `PGOPTIONS` at session start.)                                                                                                                                     |
| `log_destination`                          | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the destination for server log output.                                                                                                                                                                               |
| `log_directory`                            | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the destination directory for log files.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `log_disconnections`                       | C<br/>S | Reload<br/>Immediate                       | Service<br/>User  | Logs end of a session, including duration. (Can also be set with `PGOPTIONS` at session start.)                                                                                                                           |
| `log_duration`                             | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `log_error_verbosity`                      | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the verbosity of logged messages.                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `log_executor_stats`                       | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `log_file_mode`                            | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the file permissions for log files.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `log_filename`                             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the file name pattern for log files.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `log_hostname`                             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Logs the host name in the connection logs.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `log_line_prefix`                          | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Controls information prefixed to each log line.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `log_lock_waits`                           | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Logs long lock waits.                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `log_min_duration_statement`               | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the minimum execution time above which statements are logged.                                                                                                                                                    |
| `log_min_error_statement`                  | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.                                                                                                                                               |
| `log_min_messages`                         | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the message levels that are logged.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `log_parser_stats`                         | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `log_planner_stats`                        | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `log_rotation_age`                         | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Automatic log file rotation occurs after N minutes.                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `log_rotation_size`                        | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Automatic log file rotation occurs after N kilobytes.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `log_statement`                            | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the type of statements logged.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `log_statement_stats`                      | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.                                                                                                                                                               |
| `log_temp_files`                           | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Logs the use of temporary files larger than this number of kilobytes.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `log_timezone`                             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the time zone to use in log messages.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `log_truncate_on_rotation`                 | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Truncates existing log files of same name during log rotation.                                                                                                                                                             |
| `logging_collector`                        | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Starts a subprocess to capture stderr output and/or csv logs into log files.                                                                                                                                               |
| `maintenance_work_mem`                     | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.                                                                                                                                                            |
| `max_connections`                          | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `max_files_per_process`                    | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.                                                                                                                                             |
| `max_function_args`                        | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the maximum number of function arguments.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `max_identifier_length`                    | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the maximum identifier length.                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `max_index_keys`                           | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the maximum number of index keys.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `max_locks_per_transaction`                | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `max_pred_locks_per_transaction`           | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of predicate locks per transaction.                                                                                                                                                               |
| `max_prepared_transactions`                | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.                                                                                                                                                          |
| `max_replication_slots`                    | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of simultaneously defined replication slots.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `max_stack_depth`                          | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the maximum stack depth, in kilobytes.                                                                                                                                                                               |
| `max_standby_archive_delay`                | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing archived WAL data.                                                                                                                |
| `max_standby_streaming_delay`              | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing streamed WAL data.                                                                                                                |
| `max_wal_senders`                          | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running WAL sender processes.                                                                                                                                                   |
| `max_wal_size`                             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum size to which the WAL grows between automatic WAL checkpoints. The default is 1GB.                                                                                                                   |
| `max_worker_processes`                     | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Maximum number of concurrent worker processes.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `min_wal_size`                             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the threshold at which WAL logs is recycled rather than removed. The default is 80 MB.                                                                                                                          |
| `nls_length_semantics`[^1]                     | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the semantics to use for char, varchar, varchar2 and long columns.                                                                                                                                                   |
| `odbc_lib_path`[^1]                            | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the path for ODBC library.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `optimizer_mode`[^1]                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Default optimizer mode.                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `oracle_home`[^1]                              | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the path for the Oracle home directory.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `password_encryption`                      | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Encrypts passwords.                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `pg_prewarm.autoprewarm`[^1]                   | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Enables the `autoprewarm` background worker.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `pg_prewarm.autoprewarm_interval`[^1]          | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the minimum number of seconds after which `autoprewarm` dumps shared buffers.                                                                                                                                        |
| `port`                                     | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the TCP port on which the server listens.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `post_auth_delay`                          | C<br/>S | Reload<br/>Immediate                       | Service<br/>User  | Waits N seconds on connection startup after authentication. (Can also be set with `PGOPTIONS` at session start.)                                                                                                          |
| `pre_auth_delay`                           | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Waits N seconds on connection startup before authentication.                                                                                                                                                              |
| `qreplace_function`[^1]                        | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | The function to be used by Query Replace feature. Note: For internal use only.                                                                                                                                            |
| `query_rewrite_enabled`[^1]                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Skils dhild table scans if their constraints guarantee that no rows match the query.                                                                                                                            |
| `query_rewrite_integrity`[^1]                  | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Sets the degree to which query rewriting must be enforced.                                                                                                                                                                |
| `quote_all_identifiers`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | When generating SQL fragments, quotes all identifiers.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `random_page_cost`                         | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.                                                                                                                                           |
| `restart_after_crash`                      | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Reinitializes server after backend crash.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `search_path`                              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.                                                                                                                                                     |
| `segment_size`                             | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the number of pages per disk file.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `seq_page_cost`                            | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page.                                                                                                                                              |
| `server_encoding`                          | D        | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Sets the server (database) character set encoding.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `server_version`                           | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the server version.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `server_version_num`                       | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the server version as an integer.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `session_preload_libraries`                | S         | Immediate*  | Super                  | Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend.<br/>* only at connection start                                                                                                                                                                      |

| `sql_inheritance`                          | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.                                                                                                                                                           |
| `ssl`                                      | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Enables SSL connections.                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

| `standard_conforming_strings`              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Causes '...' strings to treat backslashes literally.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `statement_timeout`                        | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the maximum allowed duration of any statement.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `stats_temp_directory`                     | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Writes temporary statistics files to the specified directory.                                                                                                                                                             |
| `superuser_reserved_connections`           | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers.                                                                                                                                                              |

| `track_counts`                             | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Collects statistics on database activity.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `track_functions`                          | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Collects function-level statistics on database activity.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `track_io_timing`                          | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Collects timing statistics for database I/O activity.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `transaction_deferrable`                   | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Specifies whether to defer a read-only serializable transaction until it can be executed with no possible serialization failures.                                                                                                   |
| `transaction_isolation`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the current transaction's isolation level.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `transaction_read_only`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the current transaction's read-only status.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `transform_null_equals`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Treats `"expr=NULL"` as `"expr IS NULL"`.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `unix_socket_directories`                  | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the directory where the Unix-domain socket is created.                                                                                                                                                          |
| `unix_socket_group`                        | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `unix_socket_permissions`                  | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `update_process_title`                     | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Updates the process title to show the active SQL command.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `utl_encode.uudecode_redwood`[^1]              | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Allows decoding of Oracle-created uuencoded data.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `utl_file.umask`[^1]                           | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Umask used for files created through the `UTL_FILE` package.                                                                                                                                                              |
| `vacuum_cost_delay`                        | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds.                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `vacuum_cost_limit`                        | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Vacuum cost amount available before napping.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `vacuum_cost_page_dirty`                   | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Vacuum cost for a page dirtied by vacuum.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `vacuum_cost_page_hit`                     | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Vacuum cost for a page found in the buffer cache.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `vacuum_cost_page_miss`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Vacuum cost for a page not found in the buffer cache.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `vacuum_defer_cleanup_age`                 | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Number of transactions by which `VACUUM` and `HOT` cleanup should be deferred, if any.                                                                                                                                    |
| `vacuum_freeze_min_age`                    | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Minimum age at which `VACUUM` should freeze a table row.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `vacuum_freeze_table_age`                  | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Age at which `VACUUM` should scan whole table to freeze tuples.                                                                                                                                                           |
| `vacuum_multixact_freeze_min_age`          | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Minimum age at which `VACUUM` should freeze a MultiXactId in a table row.                                                                                                                                                 |
| `vacuum_multixact_freeze_table_age`        | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Multixact age at which `VACUUM` should scan whole table to freeze tuples.                                                                                                                                                 |
| `wal_block_size`                           | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the block size in the write ahead log.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `wal_buffers`                              | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.                                                                                                                                                            |
| `wal_keep_segments`                        | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the number of WAL files held for standby servers.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `wal_level`                                | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Set the level of information written to the WAL.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `wal_log_hints`                            | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint, even for non-critical modifications.                                                                                                                     |
| `wal_receiver_status_interval`             | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum interval between WAL receiver status reports to the primary.                                                                                                                                             |
| `wal_receiver_timeout`                     | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum wait time to receive data from the primary.                                                                                                                                                              |
| `wal_segment_size`                         | C         | Preset                                 | n/a                        | Shows the number of pages per write ahead log segment.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `wal_sender_timeout`                       | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Sets the maximum time to wait for WAL replication.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `wal_sync_method`                          | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates to disk.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `wal_writer_delay`                         | C         | Reload                                 | Service       | WAL writer sleep time between WAL flushes.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `work_mem`                                 | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `xloginsert_locks`                         | C         | Restart                                | Service       | Sets the number of locks used for concurrent xlog insertions.                                                                                                                                                             |
| `xmlbinary`                                | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets how binary values are to be encoded in XML.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `xmloption`                                | S         | Immediate                              | User                       | Sets whether XML data in implicit parsing and serialization operations is to be considered as documents or content fragments.                                                                                             |
| `zero_damaged_pages`                       | S         | Immediate                              | Super                  | Continues processing past damaged page headers.                                                                                                                                                                           |


[^1]: This parameter is only available on EPAS
